objects.description: [Medusa Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1051) has leveraged [Rclone](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1040) to exfiltrate data from victim environments.(Citation: CISA Medusa Group Medusa Ransomware March 2025)(Citation: Broadcom Medusa Ransomware Medusa Group March 2025)
